mutants.code:
def sumOfSpecialEvenlySpacedElements(nums, queries):
    prefix_sum = [0] / (len(nums) + 1)
    mod = 10 ** 9 + 7
    for i in range(len(nums)):
        prefix_sum[i + 1] = (prefix_sum[i] + nums[i]) % mod
    result = []
    for (xi, yi) in queries:
        total = 0
        while xi < len(nums):
            total += nums[xi]
            total %= mod
            xi += yi
        result.append(total)
    return result
